chapters.Semi_Supervised_Learning.labelPropagation.load_data()¶

chapters.Semi_Supervised_Learning.labelPropagation.test_LabelPropagation(*data)¶

测试 LabelPropagation 的用法

chapters.Semi_Supervised_Learning.labelPropagation.test_LabelPropagation_knn(*data)¶

return:None
